revision.text:
'''Where:''' *name should be filled with the number of the berry in the dex (formatted #00) and the name of the berry. *image should be filled with the berry's image. *caption should be filled with the description of the berry from the in-game berrydex (or github). *growtime should be filled with the time it takes for the berry to *fully* grow (with h/m/s as needed). *harvest should be filled with the number of berries collected when manually harvesting the plant. *replant should be filled with the replant rate of the berry. *mutation should be filled with the mutation rate of the berry. *points should be filled with the number of Farm Points gained on harvest ({{farmpoints}} is automatically added, don't add it yourself). *flavor should be filled with the flavors of the berry. Copy and paste this code after the equals sign and fill in the numbers: 

* # spicy
* # dry
* # sweet
* # bitter
* # sour
*helditem should only be included if the berry is dropped by a wild Pokémon. It should be filled with the names of each Pokémon that can drop the berry.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
